QuestData.Title: Incident Reports
QuestData.Description:
No wonder our workers are terrified to go into these woods. Generally the bears and spiders stay out of the way of humans...
But these are no ordinary beasts!
Father would be furious if productivity came to a halt. Please, cull these beasts so that the ridge can be safe once more!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Enthralled beasts in Fernwood Ridge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you looked those beasts in the eye? Something is quite unnatural about them.
QuestData.RewardText: I have never seen beasts so... soulless. It's as if they're under some sort of spell.
